skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Each hit has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Has a 40% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn if the first [Provoke] debuff is placed.
skills.name: Frustrating Muck
